data.text:
The 5th anniversary of the #ParisAgreement is an important moment to renew #ClimateAction commitments to help us make the transition to a cleaner, healthier & more prosperous future for all.

More about Saturday's Climate Ambition Summit:  https://t.co/5sL0m8Wb4p https://t.co/C7AJGUQP0w

.@UNCERF delivers life-saving humanitarian aid to those who need it most. 

At a high-level pledging event on Tuesday, the international community will be asked to support their efforts and #InvestInHumanity. https://t.co/KXP7KzjFLD https://t.co/KDMbk9vkFP

Insights from behavioural science can help shed light on the threat of terrorism.

A new international hub aims to help policymakers and practitioners effectively prevent and counter violent extremism. https://t.co/VDbge6DE17 via @UN_OCT https://t.co/eQIE83VbmK

Shift to green economy could yield economic gains of $26 trillion globally through 2030.

#ClimateAction is not only the right thing to do.
It is also the smart thing to do.

More ahead of Saturday's #ParisAgreement anniversary &  Climate Ambition Summit: https://t.co/Nvl0LyI1N0 https://t.co/9LE3AEOrYY

“Protection of civilians remains a central priority for @MONUSCO.”

@SRSG_MONUSCO Leila Zerrougui warns Security Council that people in the Democratic Republic of Congo face multiple threats, including armed attacks, displacement & #COVID19. https://t.co/p0GcgDHn8d

"Aviation is an important engine of our world, and will play a critical role in lifting the world to recovery from #COVID19."

-- @antonioguterres on Monday's Civil Aviation Day. https://t.co/ZD1v0zytI3 #FlyDay https://t.co/2y0flpvo81

#COVID19 is having a dramatic impact on sexual & reproductive health rights, from increased domestic violence & female genital mutilation to unplanned pregnancies.

In response, @UNFPA has launched a $818M appeal to help 54 million women & girls in 2021. https://t.co/nbFZLFjJAg https://t.co/kojhIxYYBt

The aviation industry helps support economic & social development around the world and can help achieve the #GlobalGoals. It will also play a crucial role in the #COVID19 recovery.

Monday is International Civil Aviation Day: https://t.co/Z7InkQXBuA #FlyDay https://t.co/vTQ1yUUxb1

“Dear people of the world, please don’t forget Yemen. I hope in the future we can be together in peace."

-- 12-year-old Amina is trapped in the world's worst humanitarian crisis. See how @WFP is helping those most in need in Yemen: https://t.co/tc8gx5tavZ
https://t.co/1iWvC1uau3

The world is witnessing record-high levels of displacement.

Every day, the UN works to provide protection for 82.5 million people fleeing war, famine and persecution. https://t.co/jWlwtqXf1F #UN75 https://t.co/O0lW33YG17

Every week, 5,000+ young women aged 15–24 years become infected with HIV.

Ensuring girls are able to complete secondary school can reduce their risk of getting HIV by 50%. More from @UNAIDS: https://t.co/7a5LtLCtvG https://t.co/QGf1xI6zze

There are no blurred lines when it comes to consent. 

There is no excuse for rape. 

During these #16Days of activism to end gender-based violence, here are 16 ways you can stand against rape culture: https://t.co/1GfdwyVPRH via @UN_Women https://t.co/ZzfLFQhlDG

1/3 of our food is lost or wasted every year.

Be a #ClimateAction Superhero and help take care of nature by buying 'ugly' fruit & vegetables, purchasing local foods, learning how to best store food, eating leftovers, and composting. https://t.co/nAjeCAHlAC #ActNow https://t.co/vktg3ZVhwE

"Please take care of your health and be responsible."

Hear from Soraya Bahgat, a #COVID19 survivor, about her experience, and the painful loss of her grandmother to the pandemic.

Help share information that saves lives: https://t.co/WdwMDqm3c1 https://t.co/ysxeiOV9Bu

Physical distancing does not have to mean social or emotional isolation.

Connect with your loved ones. 

We are in this together -- and we will get through this together.

🎨: @karinamuranaga https://t.co/FrmJVTuutt

1 in 33 people around the world will need humanitarian assistance in 2021 -- that's a 40% increase since the beginning of this year. 

The UN & humanitarian partners will need $35 billion to reach the most vulnerable. https://t.co/5ZU9ckIqO0 #InvestInHumanity https://t.co/SYeUETuHDo

.@EduCannotWait Director @YasmineSherif1 has dedicated her life to helping children & refugees affected by conflicts, & natural disasters.

Find out what motivated her to start working for the UN at the age of 24 in our podcast 'Awake At Night': https://t.co/9zqJUWzbXD https://t.co/WS4v5kq316

The climate crisis has not stopped amid #COVID19. 
Delaying #ClimateAction costs livelihoods and lives. 

We need a systemic shift to a more sustainable economy that works for people & the planet. https://t.co/vg9uSygy7a #GlobalGoals https://t.co/3Fs4W3hBfl

Women & lower-paid workers have been disproportionately affected by the #COVID19 crisis.

Adequate minimum wages can protect workers & reduce inequality. More in latest Global Wage Report from @ILO: https://t.co/hT8PvzIZgI https://t.co/KJn8g50J9a

The 2020 UN Media Seminar on Peace in the Middle East is happening virtually on 8-9 December. 

Send your questions to the panelists using #UNMediaSeminar. https://t.co/IaBnWsQcCG https://t.co/TWPi45LjoT

"I firmly believe that 2021 can be a new kind of leap year — the year of a quantum leap towards carbon neutrality."

-- @antonioguterres calls on countries, cities, companies & individuals to join the #RaceToZero emissions. https://t.co/r4GPuCRl59 #ClimateAction https://t.co/6Qn0tcDENd

UN Volunteers can make a positive impact on people's lives and help achieve the #GlobalGoals.

On Saturday's International Volunteer Day, see how you can join @UNVolunteers and change the world for the better. https://t.co/PiqlFEuRLS https://t.co/B2FHIKHOTA

There are more organisms within 1 gram of healthy soils than there are people on Earth. 

On Saturday's #WorldSoilDay, let's all commit to #ClimateAction and help stop soil biodiversity loss: https://t.co/KtiCPl4jaM https://t.co/Bcc90UORPo

Volunteers build a sense of togetherness. They strengthen social cohesion & help protect communities.

Volunteers deserve our heartfelt thanks.

-- @antonioguterres on Saturday's Int'l Volunteer Day. https://t.co/vX76kJa0ay https://t.co/jVcxLJpIOd

Healthy soils are key for:
🌱 Adapting to climate change
💧 Providing clean water
🍎 Achieving food security & more. 

On Saturday's #WorldSoilDay, @FAO explains what YOU can do to protect our planet's soils: https://t.co/vgC7IpRzD7 https://t.co/IvZHIvf1z8

Happy International Volunteer Day!

Volunteers are on the frontlines of the #COVID19 response, from distributing food to providing medical care & fighting misinformation.

See how you can also make a difference with @UNVolunteers: https://t.co/JPZe8gFs6N https://t.co/Gc3z6I1lZh

Soil is a living resource, home to more than 25% of our planet's biodiversity. Protecting it is key to maintaining the health of people, animals & the environment.

More from @FAO on Saturday's #WorldSoilDay: https://t.co/KtiCPkMHMc https://t.co/4UsiktsBrs

The work & commitment of millions of volunteers around the world have been essential amid the #COVID19 crisis. 

On Saturday's Int'l Volunteer Day, we thank these real life heroes who dedicate their lives to helping others. https://t.co/JPZe8gFs6N via @UNVolunteers https://t.co/YQnGqZ9kR7

Every effort must be made to ensure the pandemic recovery leaves no one behind & ensures people everywhere can live in dignity & prosperity, UN leaders stress at special #UNGA session on #COVID19. https://t.co/6kF0fSQ1nE

At @UNFCCC #ClimateDialogues, a record number of countries shared the #ClimateAction progress they have made.

~8,000 attendees from around the 🌎 came together virtually to help pave the way for a successful UN Climate Conference #COP26 in 2021. https://t.co/irjD23Vk3w https://t.co/4gmvO68GHS

Every 5 seconds, the equivalent of one soccer field is lost due to soil erosion, which is a major threat to food security & the achievement of the #GlobalGoals.

Saturday is #WorldSoilDay: https://t.co/DuSr524Jxx https://t.co/DNP4gr4Mot

"Making peace with nature is the defining task of the 21st century. It must be the top, top priority for everyone, everywhere."

-- @antonioguterres on the state of the planet. https://t.co/1ilJUq7F9s #ClimateAction https://t.co/ubw1HBYEyM

More and more cities & countries are joining the #RaceToZero, taking #ClimateAction and committing to reach net zero greenhouse gas emissions. 

Find out what "net zero" means and why is it important for a healthier, more inclusive and resilient future.
https://t.co/mGNL2bRE41

#COVID19 could push the number of people living in extreme poverty to over 1 billion by 2030.

New @UNDP study calls for greater investments in the #GlobalGoals to avoid severe long-term effects of the pandemic. https://t.co/aAxNcaWpXY https://t.co/SFnfmbXWS2

Well-functioning banks play a crucial role in financing sustainable development & can help achieve the #GlobalGoals.

On Friday's first-ever Day of Banks, learn how banking systems improve our standard of living. https://t.co/7iLY6tRA4J https://t.co/HZn5JofHvY

Based on @WHO recommendations, the UN Commission on Narcotic Drugs reclassified cannabis out of the most dangerous category of drugs on Wednesday, leading to changes in the way it is internationally regulated. https://t.co/wqxmJ7uynG https://t.co/4J0CxZluqR

2020 has been a catastrophic year for the world's children, many of whom have been affected by #COVID19, the climate crisis & conflict.

In response, @UNICEF has launched its largest-ever emergency appeal & hopes to support 190+ million children in 2021. https://t.co/3M7CfsUHor https://t.co/GI0zDlsWKc

Countries came together on Thursday for a special #UNGA session on #COVID19.

World leaders reflected on how the UN can continue supporting the global response to the pandemic, while also sharing solutions & priorities for recovering better. https://t.co/cMCLZVdsV5 https://t.co/Sm21IfEFmm

#COVID19 & the climate crisis have brought us to a threshold.  

We can't go back to the old normal of inequality, injustice & heedless dominion over the Earth.

Instead we must step towards a safer, more sustainable & equitable path.

-- @antonioguterres

#ClimateAction https://t.co/cqLpWHH3jm

"As the world recovers from the pandemic, we must ensure that the aspirations and rights of persons with disabilities are included and accounted for."

-- @antonioguterres on Thursday's Day of People with Disabilities. https://t.co/WhOhm0qZJX #IDPD https://t.co/HA5EKnaUyB

#VaccinesWork

Vaccines are safe & help prevent millions of deaths every year. Yet, a growing number of networks seek to undermine trust in vaccinations.

Help share verified information that saves lives: https://t.co/9cNARG43wd https://t.co/AjiaCvOMCC

"My teacher tells me to paint what's in my mind & in my dreams."

Artist Amir Tamang was born without the use of his arms or legs - yet, he continues to follow his dreams through art. 

Watch his inspiring story on the Day of People with Disabilities. https://t.co/ivnT1nTYvF https://t.co/1iHORroc82

"Making peace with nature is the defining task of the 21st century. 
It must be the top, top priority for everyone, everywhere."

-- @antonioguterres spoke about the need for urgent #ClimateAction at @Columbia. See highlights in our @TwitterMoments:
https://t.co/xXxNVBXL15

Recovering better after #COVID19 will require creating inclusive environments, including workplaces free of discrimination. 

Learn more during this week's #COSP13. https://t.co/4gHEFrn5RB https://t.co/gxVS7ByQBT

0️⃣ Achieve global carbon neutrality. 
💵 Align global finance behind the #ParisAgreement. 
🌎 Deliver a breakthrough on adaptation to protect the world from climate impacts. 

@antonioguterres outlines 3 critical components to tackle the climate crisis. https://t.co/1ilJUqpgy2 https://t.co/qwJ9Iw6N86

"We are 1.5 billion strong and, notwithstanding the fact we disproportionately bear the brunt of the worst effects of the global health crisis, we are still here."
--SDG Advocate @eddiendopu on Thursday's Day of People with Disabilities. https://t.co/ivnT1obzUf #GlobalGoals #IDPD https://t.co/82xrgE5wPg

"Now is the time to transform humankind’s relationship with the natural world – and with each other.

And we must do so together.  

Solidarity is humanity. Solidarity is survival."

-- @antonioguterres on the state of the planet. https://t.co/1ilJUq7F9s #ClimateAction https://t.co/x3pKmCRSNS

🌡️ 2020 set to be among 3 warmest years on record 
🧊 Ice and glaciers are melting 
🌊 Ocean heat is at record levels

@WMO's #StateOfClimate report stresses the urgent need for #ClimateAction:
https://t.co/5Nmcs3uU7c
https://t.co/53Kjv75MT4

Mindsets are shifting. 

More & more people are understanding the need for their own daily choices to reduce their carbon footprint. 

Young people are pushing their elders to do what's right. 

-- @antonioguterres on the need for #ClimateAction https://t.co/1ilJUq7F9s https://t.co/HGqGeZ14TM

The world must decrease fossil fuel production by 6% per year to limit catastrophic global warming.

Instead, #COVID19 recovery plans could result in increases.

We need urgent #ClimateAction to close the #ProductionGap: https://t.co/i6Mj4PPNnX via @UNEP https://t.co/RG1QW1wGO2

As some of us brace for cold & flu season, @WHO’s Consultant Epidemiologist, Dr. Amjad Alkouly, explains how you can protect yourself & your family from these illnesses amid #COVID19.

Help share more verified information that saves lives: https://t.co/WdwMDqm3c1 https://t.co/qjWAqLBHEo

"We have a chance to not simply reset the world economy but to transform it. A sustainable economy driven by renewable energies will create new jobs, cleaner infrastructure & a resilient future."

-- @antonioguterres calls for #ClimateAction. https://t.co/1ilJUqpgy2 https://t.co/TeXsE4stcU

Globally, 24.9 million people are still subjected to forced labour, which traps victims in servitude, debt & poverty.  

On Wednesday's Abolition of Slavery Day, support @ILO's global movement to end slavery once and for all. https://t.co/ls6pBWGfsd https://t.co/nqyLFuarT3

Watch live as @antonioguterres discusses the state of the planet and the need for urgent #ClimateAction at @Columbia University.

https://t.co/GCqDuHn6EH

Today, more than 40 million people are victims of modern slavery. 71% of them are women & girls.

Understanding the scale of the problem is the first step to knowing how to address it. More on Wednesday's Abolition of Slavery Day: https://t.co/BSOdLY1gih https://t.co/buqkjv2KHE

Learn to recognize the signs of an abusive relationship. 

@UN_Women has more on how we can all help end violence against women & support victims: https://t.co/oeaiWJkaOc https://t.co/cge40ZJNba

Modern slavery is all around us, but most people don't even realize it.

On Wednesday's Abolition of Slavery Day, see how you can make a difference: https://t.co/r0QB0LPERF #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/7dhglaQPOb

As the world continues its fights against #COVID19, the UN supports governments, communities and individuals.

Find examples in our latest @TwitterMoments: https://t.co/I6YfsuIioR

Slavery is not merely a historical relic. 40 million+ people worldwide are victims of modern slavery. 1 in 4 are children.

On Wednesday's Abolition of Slavery Day, learn how to recognize modern slavery & raise your voice for those who can't: https://t.co/Xdf228fFVv via @ILO https://t.co/kc3ORpwUJY

"The pandemic has highlighted the value of migrant labour.
Many of those providing essential health & care services are migrant women. They must no longer be invisible. "

-- @antonioguterres launches report on Global Compact #ForMigration. https://t.co/50gWwOXfxB https://t.co/Xxl6Gyxwmh

👩‍💻 2/3 of school-age children have no internet access at home & risk missing out on their education amid #COVID19-related school closures.

@UNICEF & @ITU call for urgent investments to ensure equal access to quality digital learning. https://t.co/eKi45Gg3zS https://t.co/Qa3DdleRMV

"Addressing the climate crisis & #COVID19 simultaneously requires a response stronger than any seen before to safeguard lives & livelihoods."

Hear more from @antonioguterres on 2 Dec, as he discusses the state of the planet & the need for #ClimateAction. https://t.co/r4GPuCRl59

Inclusive and accessible health systems can help beat both AIDS and #COVID19.

On #WorldAIDSDay and every day, stand up for the right to health for all. https://t.co/kcGHaZMhOd https://t.co/1olkRv3PxF

Achieving the #GlobalGoals, which includes ending the AIDS epidemic, will require ensuring access to good healthcare, regardless of how much money a person has. 

On Tuesday's #WorldAIDSDay, join @UNAIDS in standing up for the right to health for all. https://t.co/7a5LtLCtvG https://t.co/90MfYZXbd5

This #GivingTuesday is an opportunity to make a difference in the lives of others amid the #COVID19 pandemic. 

Join @UNFoundation and give what you can to help make our world a better place for all. https://t.co/Qvc7hLrxHU https://t.co/lwvJ5qAGAs

A record 235 million people worldwide will need humanitarian assistance & protection in 2021 - a 40% increase from last year, mostly due to #COVID19. 

@UNOCHA's Global Humanitarian Overview highlights the urgent need to #InvestInHumanity. https://t.co/mpbqI9lYAq https://t.co/Cb8egNDe4F
On Tuesday's #WorldAIDSDay, learn more about progress made in addressing the AIDS epidemic & efforts to end the disease by 2030. https://t.co/s4PaYzdtfd https://t.co/mabLp8TvlX

A new virtual exhibit from the UN shows how people from all walks of life have found ways to express solidarity with the Palestinian people, including through art: https://t.co/dP5qukCcWE #PalestineDay https://t.co/9nCOdlCn1F

Access to #COVID19 services should be prioritized for vulnerable groups, including people living with HIV.

On Tuesday's #WorldAIDSDay, @UNAIDS shares key facts on HIV & the coronavirus pandemic: https://t.co/6LnZyjv9VK https://t.co/reJGtiX3ei
South Africa assumes the presidency of the Security Council for the month of December. Follow @SAMissionNY for updates: https://t.co/xPyoHd4jHs https://t.co/XFkS5qFtEZ

Globally, 12.6 million people living with HIV still don't have access to treatment, and #COVID19 is exacerbating the challenges they face.

More from @UNAIDS on Tuesday's #WorldAIDSDay: https://t.co/7a5LtLCtvG https://t.co/uqyhPro6lo

"The surest way to end #COVID19 is also the fairest."

-- @UN_PGA launches global #Vaccines4All initiative ahead of this week's special #UNGA session on the #coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/g3LHBlqaQV https://t.co/X2aI22Q5UC

Despite some successes, global progress to #EndMalaria has levelled off in recent years, with #COVID19 posing additional challenges.

New @WHO report calls for increased funding, access to health services & investment in research & innovation. https://t.co/KwF7QrwkMG https://t.co/ZOOqSY2baY

Your shares on social media can have far-reaching consequences in the real world, especially as misinformation causes global harm amid #COVID19. 

#PledgeToPause and take time to verify facts and sources before you share something online. https://t.co/q5ZFkROycf https://t.co/K3cxJbNnUR

"The use of chemical weapons anywhere, by anyone, under any circumstances, is intolerable and a serious violation of international law."

-- @antonioguterres on Monday's Day of Remembrance for All Victims of Chemical Warfare. https://t.co/ZiQZmfsUSm https://t.co/u9EFYbIfjI

Millions of migrants & displaced persons lack access to basic healthcare and miss out on key life-saving vaccines.

@UNMigration & @Gavi are working to improve their immunization coverage, including access to a future #COVID19 vaccine. https://t.co/wNJTibSnfq https://t.co/iWI1VHAKw4
On Monday's Day of Remembrance for All Victims of Chemical Warfare, see how @OPCW oversees global efforts to achieve a world free of chemical weapons. https://t.co/ZS0bpSXZ5w https://t.co/dZyRfbRfuk

Limit your exposure to #COVID19 by:

👥👥👥 avoiding crowded places
↔️ keeping physical distance
🪟 opening windows
😷 wearing a mask 

Help share more verified information that saves lives: https://t.co/9cNARGlEUN https://t.co/XgpCvtWVAO

Current climate trends are alarming and we urgently need more ambitious #ClimateAction. 

On 2 December, listen to @antonioguterres discuss the state of the planet to find out more about how we can protect our planet & our future.  https://t.co/EyyAa17Lm5 https://t.co/MAsz4SwuKS

It may not always make the headlines -- but the UN works all over the world to prevent conflict and promote peace and stability.

As we mark our 75th anniversary, see how else the UN makes a difference in the lives of everyone, everywhere:  https://t.co/Z1mKcW36cl #UN75 https://t.co/xzZdnqcTrU

Violence against women & girls is a human rights violation that’s been perpetuated for decades. It’s pervasive, but not inevitable -- unless we stay silent.

During the #16Days of activism & every day, speak out to help break the cycle of abuse. https://t.co/CW8xnojs5d https://t.co/IXWBlDR2jg

One country - one vote. 

Our colleagues from the UN Audiovisual Library explain how the General Assembly works. 

They have dug through 75 years of audiovisual heritage to bring you some #UNGA trivia. More: https://t.co/Nc0pqp6pCR #UN75 https://t.co/lu7HZ3ZWYP

The world's jaguar population has declined dramatically due to human activity, including land clearing for development & agriculture and poaching.

On Sunday's #JaguarDay, read about one of @UNDP's projects to protect the big cats in Latin America. https://t.co/03F5QJMhhK

"Let us together resolve to renew our commitment to the Palestinian people in their quest to achieve their inalienable rights and build a future of peace, dignity, justice and security."

-- @antonioguterres on Sunday's #PalestineDay. https://t.co/JQUG0zNZfZ https://t.co/uZMoUOZFfE

In the last two decades, the jaguar population has declined by 20-25% due to habitat loss, environmental degradation, poaching & illegal trade.

On Sunday's #JaguarDay, learn how @UNEP is working to protect these emblematic cats. 

https://t.co/SM6alaka2A

Ahead of Sunday's #PalestineDay, see how you can help @UNRWA provide life-saving assistance to Palestine refugees, including improving access to healthcare & education, supporting the #COVID19 response, and more: https://t.co/giG7btEJsB https://t.co/Jpib91Ul79

Misinformation during #COVID19 can put lives at risk. 

Take time to verify facts before you share something online. https://t.co/uxo77PaR9U #TakeCareBeforeYouShare https://t.co/DgFQLJEHuk

Around the world, survivors of gender-based violence are stepping up to help other women.

Here's the inspiring story of a young refugee & victim of child trafficking who is committed to protecting women & girls in Costa Rica: https://t.co/UmGfb1WsSt via @UN_SDG #16Days https://t.co/P9Xgf41H4t

The #ParisAgreement is an international treaty on the climate emergency which aims to limit global warming and help build resilience to protect people and planet. 

More from @UNFCCC: https://t.co/lL9hCtcS5q #ClimateAction https://t.co/L94DHs8zbD

1/3 of all food produced globally is lost or wasted every year.

Amid supply chain challenges due to #COVID19, @UNDP explains how cities can prevent food loss & achieve #ZeroHunger through #ClimateAction solutions.

https://t.co/k56liv5XVd

#COVID19 is resulting in a sharp increase in gender-based violence among refugee women & girls.

Psycho-social support, health services & safe shelters must be prioritized during the pandemic, says @Refugees.

https://t.co/cN7w338c5S

The death penalty does little to serve victims or deter crime. 

170 countries have either abolished the death penalty or introduced a moratorium on its use. 

More from @UNHumanRights: https://t.co/AtIhxow7lF #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/TRVyuIatmN

The climate crisis has not stopped amid #COVID19. 

On 2 December, @antonioguterres will talk about the state of the planet, setting the stage for scaled-up #ClimateAction & ambition.
 
More details here: https://t.co/EyyAa1pmdD https://t.co/IAZlJtnslj

Long-term impacts of #COVID19 could result in up to 293,000 additional new HIV infections, according to @UNAIDS.

A new report presents ways to navigate the #coronavirus pandemic, end the AIDS epidemic and ensure the right to #HealthForAll. https://t.co/f9OlQJQ3gW https://t.co/0hivPaheg6

#ActNow to become part of the zero-waste fashion movement:
🔸 Buy eco-friendly clothes 👕
